name: vendetta-build_scripts
description: catppuccin for react-native mobile discord mods

scripts.build: command -v whiskers >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo >&2 "Whiskers is not installed. Please install it from https://github.com/catppuccin/whiskers or your package manager of choice"; exit 1; } && whiskers react_native.tera
scripts.host: echo "make sure to allow your phone through your firewall." && http-server -p 3120
